title: In some cases problems with Uppercase
author: paoloholzl
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
## Expected Behavior

<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
Connected from Windows 2010 Pro 21H2 to other Win 10 Pro 21H2 on a virtual machine Virtualbox, all with italian keyboard, often Shift is not functioning.
In some situation using shift lock work bud not normal shift.
In rare case also some characters are not functioning (but the keyboard language is correct)

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet:
Never experienced anything similar, only got the control key to stick which has nothing to do with mRemoteNG itself. 

But that aside, what version of mRemoteNG are you using? Did you try the nightly build?

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
